name: Priya Sharma
title: From Stay-at-Home Mom to Tech Leader
summary: After a 5-year career break, Priya successfully returned to tech and now leads a development team at a major tech company.
quote: The support and mentorship I received through JobsForHer was instrumental in my successful return to tech.

name: Anita Patel
title: Breaking into Data Science
summary: Transitioned from traditional analytics to data science through upskilling and mentorship.
quote: The learning resources and community support helped me make a successful career transition.

name: Meera Reddy
title: Rising Through Product Management
summary: Started as a software developer and successfully transitioned to product management.
quote: The career guidance and networking opportunities opened new doors for my career growth.
